Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • Library
  • public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
    A Library consists of multiple shelves

        public Library​(java.lang.String name,

        Parameters:

        capacity - Max shelves the library can hold

        Parameters:

        capacity - integer representing the capacity of the Shelf to be added.
        Returns:
